ARABIC: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they saw them, they would say, 'Those people are misguided.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And when they saw them, they said: "They have indeed gone astray."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and when they saw the believers, they said: “Lo! These are the erring ones”;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On seeing the believers, they would say, "These people have gone astray".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And upon seeing the Muslims, they used to say, “Indeed they have gone astray.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when they saw them, they said: "Verily, these have indeed gone astray!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when they saw them, they said: Most surely these are in error;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and when they saw them they said, 'Lo, these men are astray!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when they saw them they said: Lo! these have gone astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when they saw them, they said [scornfully], "These men have surely gone astray,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when they saw them, they said: verily these are the strayed ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and when they saw them they would say, ‘Indeed those are the astray!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And whenever they saw them, they would say, "Behold! These are the people truly astray!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when they saw them, they said: "Verily! These have indeed gone astray!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and when they saw them said: 'These are they who are astray'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And if they saw them, they would say, “These people are lost.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:32] and when they see them, that is, the believers, they say, ‘Lo! these [men] are astray!’, on account of their belief in Muhammad (s).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when they saw them) and when they saw the Companions of the Prophet (pbuh) (they said) i.e. the disbelievers said: (Lo! These) the Companions of the Prophet (pbuh) (have gone astray) from true guidance.
